title: SPLASH
description: A 90-minute Campus-level coding competition wherein participants are given a problem set to solve in their preferred programming language and get an opportunity to show up their programming skills.

title: GameHub 2.O
description: Bored of old games? Create your own at **GameHub-2.0**, a 3-day hackathon by Scope Club. Join the bootcamp, learn from experts, and build a game on limitless themes. Unleash your creativity and bring ideas to life!

title: Modifest
description: SCOPE Club is back again to provide you an oppurtunity to explore the most popular domains WEB and APP Development with modifest

title: CBUG Contest
description: Join our 7-day online contest and showcase your skills! The winner grabs an Amazon Gift Voucher, while well-performing participants receive a free Udemy course. Don't miss this chance to learn, compete, and win exciting rewards!

title: GameHub
description: Participate in a 36-hour hackathon focused on game development! Turn your ideas into reality, collaborate with like-minded developers, and build an exciting game. A perfect chance to innovate, compete, and showcase your creativity in game design!

title: Codewars
description: Join an exciting coding contest on the Coding Ninjas platform! Test your problem-solving skills, compete with top coders, and showcase your talent. A perfect opportunity to challenge yourself and improve your coding expertise!

title: AppFiesta
description: A hackathon focused on mobile application development, bringing together developers to design, build, and innovate mobile solutions. This event fosters creativity, collaboration, and technical expertise, offering a platform to explore new ideas and enhance development skills.
